summary: Iteration 8 - Frontend testing of 6 bug fixes in Hatake.Social TCG platform. All features verified working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Shop page: e.stopPropagation() correctly implemented on Add to Cart button (line 295) - prevents modal from opening when clicking button
Feed page: QUICK_REACTIONS array (line 42) contains correct 7 emojis without thumb - ['â¤ï¸', 'ğŸ˜‚', 'ğŸ˜®', 'ğŸ˜¢', 'ğŸ˜¡', 'ğŸ”¥', 'ğŸ’¯']
Groups page: Quick Stats section implemented with 4 stat cards (My Groups, Public, Admin, Total Members) - lines 156-185
Groups page: Discover tab shows public groups with enhanced card layout including badges and expand functionality
Layout.tsx: Favicon metadata properly configured with /favicon.ico and external PNG fallbacks

shop_add_to_cart_fix.notes: Clicking 'Add to Cart' button adds item to cart WITHOUT opening product detail modal. e.stopPropagation() fix working correctly. Cart Summary appears in bottom-right after adding item.
evidence: Clicked Add to Cart button - no modal opened
Cart Summary widget appeared with item details and payment info

cart_summary_display.notes: Cart Summary displays correctly after adding item - shows item name, quantity, total price, and payment options (Swish: 123-587 57 37, Kontonummer: 9660-357 25 85, Bankgiro: 5051-0031)

groups_quick_stats.notes: Quick Stats section visible on Groups page with 4 cards: MY GROUPS (blue), PUBLIC (cyan), ADMIN (purple), TOTAL MEMBERS (green)

groups_discover_tab.notes: Discover tab shows 3 public groups with enhanced card layout. Each group has: Public badge (cyan), Join Group button, More/expand button, member count

feed_reactions_no_thumb.notes: Emoji picker shows 7 reactions WITHOUT thumb emoji: â¤ï¸, ğŸ˜‚, ğŸ˜®, ğŸ˜¢, ğŸ˜¡, ğŸ”¥, ğŸ’¯. QUICK_REACTIONS array correctly excludes ğŸ‘
evidence: Opened emoji picker on feed post

favicon_loading.notes: Favicon.ico exists and loads correctly. HTTP 200 response, content-type: image/x-icon, file size: 182KB. Metadata configured in layout.tsx with fallback PNG

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 requested frontend features verified working: 1) Shop Add to Cart fix with e.stopPropagation(), 2) Cart Summary display with payment info, 3) Groups Quick Stats section, 4) Groups Discover tab with enhanced cards, 5) Feed reactions without thumb emoji, 6) Favicon loading correctly. Note: Existing thumb reactions on posts are historical data - new reactions can only use the 7 approved emojis.
